alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, west central Camden, southwestern Brantley, east central Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Race Pond, or 11 miles northwest of Folkston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland and Race Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
